subject: Dear
body:
Dear
You are the next of kin to our late Gold Merchant worth 30 Million Dollars.
Reply for more information
Albert Sajid

subject: Re:    Dear
body:
Dear Albert Sajid,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by your message about being the next of kin to a late Gold Merchant. Could you please provide me with more details about this opportunity? I would like to understand how I can be involved and what it entails.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mattie

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Thanks so much for your message, I appreciate your mail.

I am Mr. Albert Sajid an employee of Siam Commercial Bank Thailand Pcl
here in Thailand. I am the personal accountant to Fatima Mattie, who
was a Gold Merchant.

On the 4-12-2020, Fatima Mattie was involved in a car accident. All
occupants of the vehicle unfortunately lost their lives. Since then, I
have made several inquiries to locate any of my customer extended
relatives but to no avail.

After these several unsuccessful attempts, I decided to contact you to
help me since you both have the same surname.

I have contacted you to assist me in repatriating the money left
behind by Fatima Mattie before they get confiscated or declared
un-serviceable by my bank where these huge deposits were lodged.

Since I have been unsuccessful in locating any of the relatives for
many years now, I seek your consent to present you as the next of kin
to the deceased so that the proceeds of this account can be paid to
you and then you and me can share the money 50% to me and 50% to you.

This transaction is legitimate and in essence it will undergo normal
procedures as stipulated in the financial and allied matters act and
all the required legal documents will be issued in your name.

All I require is your honest cooperation to enable us see this deal through.

I guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement
that will protect you from any breach of the law.

Please, ensure you forward YOUR FULL DETAILS which include the following

Full names
Address
Telephone number
Occupation
Nationality in your next response.

Thank very much

Mr. Albert Sajid

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello Mr. Albert Sajid,

Thank you for reaching out to me and explaining the situation. I'm sorry to hear about the car accident involving Fatima Mattie. It must have been a difficult time for everyone involved.

I understand that you have been trying to locate any of Fatima Mattie's extended relatives without success. It's unfortunate that no one has been found so far. However, I'm curious about how you came across my name since we share the same surname. Could you please provide more details on how you found me?

Also, I appreciate your assurance that this is a legitimate matter and will undergo proper procedures according to the financial and legal regulations. However, before proceeding further, I would like to know more about the specific amount of money left behind by Fatima Mattie and how it is currently being held in your bank.

Furthermore, could you clarify what role you expect me to play in this process? You mentioned sharing the money between us, but I would like to understand the exact nature of my involvement and responsibilities.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mattie
